text: Mirosław Piotr Copija (born 1 August 1965), is a Polish former ice hockey player. He played for Podhale Nowy Targ, SMS Warszawa, and GKS Tychy during his career. He also played for the Polish national team at the 1988 Winter Olympics and 1989 World Championship, and several lower division tournaments. With Podhale he won the Polish league championship five years in a row, from 1993 to 1997. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:GKS Tychy (ice hockey) players Category:Ice hockey players at the 1988 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Poland Category:Podhale Nowy Targ players Category:Polish ice hockey centres Category:SMS Warszawa players Category:Sportspeople from Bielsko-Biała
title: Mirosław Copija
